price: On the Day when they will be shoved into the Fire forcefully,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
